title: Had multiple D/Cs in an ARAM
body: Hello, I just finished with an ARAM, in which my teammates D/Ced multiple times. At first, it was just Yi, but shortly after he reconnected our Aurelion Sol D/Ced. The real issue came after he connected, in which after some time Yi, Aurelion Sol, and Ahri disconnected at the same time. Is there some sort of issue with connectivity happening, because I've never had something like this happen before.

replies.body:
It may have been a total coincidence, or the game server you were playing on could have had some kind of weird hiccup. If the server was having an issue, then all of you would have been dc's without being able to reconnect. 

Since you weren't the one being dc'd, your network should be fine. If you want to double check your network just in case, go through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
